comments:
I got a ClassCastException in the .log file using:
eclipse.buildId=I20070228-0930
java.version=1.6.0_01
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=fr_CA
Framework arguments:  -startup D:\eclipse\I0228\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.equinox.launcher_1.0.0.v20070226.jar -showlocation

Hopefully the stack trace will allow you to find out how this is possible.
